main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over the shore of Guam on September 7, 1950, described as a circular object about 600 feet wide.
interesting points: Witness claimed to see port holes in the object, which emitted blue gas., The object was luminous and no sound was heard., It was a mile away and disappeared into a white cloud., Investigations revealed no unusual phenomena in the vicinity on the observation date., Air Force personnel reported difficulty locating the object despite numerous sightings.
